newsitem.title: UK: BA no comment on China Air report.
newsitem.headline: BA no comment on China Air report.

text.p: British Airways Plc said on Tuesday it had no comment to make on a newspaper report from Taipei that it is set to buy a 16 percent stake in Taiwan's China Airlines.

"It is not our policy to comment on speculation with regard to possible mergers, acquisitions or investments," a BA press spokesman said in London. "If we had any announcement to make, we would do so."
China Airlines, and its major shareholder, China Aviation Development Foundation, are currently seeking to place new shares equal to a 16 percent stake in the company.
Taiwan's Economic Daily News said on Tuesday that British Airways was likely to buy the shares in a deal worth about T$6.3 billion, or around 135 million stg.
An executive at the Taiwanese airline told Reuters earlier that talks were being held with interested foreign buyers but no deals had yet been struck.
